snippet: Elizabeth Edwards resisted believing that her husband, John, had fathered a child during an affair and wanted him at her side when she died, a close friend testified.
abstract: Jennifer Palmieri, close friend of Elizabeth Edwards, takes the stand in federal trial against former Sen John Edwards; Palmieri's testimony paints a vivid portrait of Elizabeth Edward's profound suffering as she came to grips with her husband's affair.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth Edwards resisted believing that her husband, John, had fathered a child during an affair and wanted him at her side when she died, a close friend testified.

headline.seo: At John Edwards Trial, Friend Tells of Wife’s Torment
headline.main: Edwards Jury Is Told How Wife Was Torn
